name: 3dTrackID
author: AFNI Team
description: FACTID-based tractography code for AFNI, part of FATCAT

inputs.description: The mode of tracking: DET, MINIP, or PROB
inputs.name: Tracking mode

inputs.description: Network ROI mask(s)
inputs.name: Network ROI mask

inputs.description: Prefix for output files
inputs.name: Output file prefix

inputs.description: Input DTI volumes basename
inputs.name: DTI input prefix

inputs.description: Alternative way to specify DTI input files, a NIML-formatted text file
inputs.name: DTI list file

inputs.description: Option for extra scalar for WM skeleton thresholding
inputs.name: Extra DTI input prefix

inputs.description: Turn off automatic search for additional scalar files to include in output
inputs.name: DTI search no flag

inputs.description: Single brik dataset with generalized FA (GFA) info
inputs.name: HARDI GFA dataset

inputs.description: Directions file for HARDI data containing directions components
inputs.name: HARDI directions file

inputs.description: Prefix to search for scalar files naming format
inputs.name: HARDI pars prefix

inputs.description: Mask within which tracking is done. Optional but highly recommended.
inputs.name: Brain mask

inputs.description: Extra restrictor mask through which paths are strictly required to pass
inputs.name: Thru mask

inputs.description: Make tracts stop at outer surfaces of the target ROIs
inputs.name: Stop at target surfaces flag

inputs.description: Make tracts stop just before entering target surfaces
inputs.name: Stop between target surfaces flag

inputs.description: Control logic connections among target ROIs per network
inputs.name: Logic for connections

inputs.description: Number of whole brain Monte Carlo iterations for mini-probabilistic tracking
inputs.name: Mini-probabilistic iterations

inputs.description: Uncertainty values file
inputs.name: Uncertainty values file

inputs.description: Minimum stdev for perturbing FA
inputs.name: Min stdev for perturbing FA

inputs.description: Minimum stdev for perturbing direction-vectors
inputs.name: Min stdev for perturbing direction-vectors

inputs.description: Specify tracking parameter quantities file in ASCII
inputs.name: Algorithm options file

inputs.description: Set threshold for FA map or other WM proxy
inputs.name: FA/GFA threshold

inputs.description: Set maximum angle for turning during propagation
inputs.name: Max angle threshold (degrees)

inputs.description: Set minimum physical length of tracts to keep
inputs.name: Min length threshold (mm)

inputs.description: Number of seeds per voxel in x-direction
inputs.name: Number of x seeds

inputs.description: Number of seeds per voxel in y-direction
inputs.name: Number of y seeds

inputs.description: Number of seeds per voxel in z-direction
inputs.name: Number of z seeds

inputs.description: Value for thresholding the fraction of tracks through a voxel for a given connection
inputs.name: Threshold fraction

inputs.description: Number of seeds per voxel per Monte Carlo iteration
inputs.name: Seeds per voxel

inputs.description: Number of Monte Carlo iterations
inputs.name: Monte Carlo iterations

inputs.description: Run three extra track parameter scalings for each connection
inputs.name: Extra parameter scaling flag

inputs.description: Keep entire track even if overshoots a target
inputs.name: Keep uncut at targets flag

inputs.description: Output individual masks of ROI connections
inputs.name: Dump ROIs mode

inputs.description: Turn off label table use in ROI dump output
inputs.name: No label table flag

inputs.description: DON'T apply numerical labels of original ROIs in dump output
inputs.name: Consecutive labels flag

inputs.description: Output individual files with number of tracks per voxel per pair
inputs.name: Posteriori flag

inputs.description: Record dataset origin in header of *.trk file
inputs.name: Record origin flag

inputs.description: Output *.trk files for viewing in TrackVis
inputs.name: Output TrackVis flag

inputs.description: Oppositize voxel_order for TRK files
inputs.name: Oppositize voxel order flag

inputs.description: Output files in *.nii.gz format
inputs.name: Nifti output flag

inputs.description: Do not output INDIMAP and PAIRMAP volumes
inputs.name: No INDIMAP/PAIRMAP flag

inputs.description: Write out ROI labels
inputs.name: Write ROIs flag

inputs.description: Write out all option values
inputs.name: Write options flag

inputs.description: Switch to use powers of two labelling for PAIRMAP
inputs.name: PAIRMAP powers flag

inputs.description: Set verbosity level
inputs.name: Verbosity level

output-files.description: Text file output of statistics of WM-ROIs
output-files.name: Statistics grid file

output-files.description: Track-like output for viewing in SUMA
output-files.name: Track output for SUMA

output-files.description: TrackVis-like output for viewing in TrackVis
output-files.name: TrackVis output

output-files.description: Output file of all ROI labels
output-files.name: ROI labels output
